mapper.select: select * from notification where restaurant_id=#{restaurantId} and deleted=false
mapper.update: update notification set deleted= true where id = #{id} and deleted = false
mapper.insert: insert into notification (create_time, title, content, confirmation, sender_id, receiver_type,restaurant_id) values (#{createTime}, #{title}, #{content}, #{confirmation, typeHandler=zrgj.order_everyday.handler.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{senderId}, #{receiverType},#{restaurantId})
